Unit SynaCode

Coding utils


Description
This init contains some functuions for coding and decoding some special codes like base64, UUcode, XXcode, calculating CRC, etc.


Procedures
Crc16
Crc32
Decode4to3
Decode4to3Ex
DecodeBase64
DecodeQuotedPrintable
DecodeTriplet
DecodeURL
DecodeUU
DecodeXX
Encode3to4
EncodeBase64
EncodeQuotedPrintable
EncodeTriplet
EncodeURL
EncodeURLElement
HMAC_MD5
MD5
UpdateCrc16
UpdateCrc32
